name: Star Wars - Malacros: Wardens from Beyond the Perlemian
name_original: Star Wars - Malacros: Wardens from Beyond the Perlemian
description:
A short profile and history of the Malacros Wardens, ruthless, isolationist adversaries encountered in the less explored regions of a galaxy far, far away.

This Adventure Jam entry is designed to be compatible with Edge Studios' Star Wars RPGs.
